CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL( Facilitator_QA_ed__c, 'Facilitator 1' ), Facilitator_1__r.FirstName + ' ' +Facilitator_1__r.LastName , IF(ISPICKVAL(Facilitator_QA_ed__c, 'Facilitator 2'),
Facilitator_2__r.FirstName + ' ' + Facilitator_2__r.LastName ,
IF(ISPICKVAL( Facilitator_QA_ed__c, 'Both'),
Facilitator_1__r.FirstName + ' ' +Facilitator_1__r.LastName +' , ' + Facilitator_2__r.FirstName + ' ' + Facilitator_2__r.LastName ,
'')))
CustomField.label: Facilitator QA'ed Names
